channel.title: changelog on tmail
channel.description: Recent content in changelog on tmail

item.title: Changelog
item.description: v 0.0.8 DKIM: sign outgoing message (test) v 0.0.7 BugFix message-id REST /queue Bugfix: race condition on deliverd Add concurrency limits on smtpd v 0.0.6 REST API base REST API /users v 0.0.5 Log to file Improve log Case sensitivity on local part add RSET and NOOP SMTP verbs v 0.0.4 Add local deliveries Dovecot support SmtpUser replaced by Use Cli Refactoring v 0.0.3 Bugfix: MySQL Datetime to Golang time.Time BugFix: Optimise/fix queries for Mysql v 0.
